column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Department of Investigation and Procedure of the Immigration Department on Thursday morning expelled 11 Chinese From the Kingdom of Cambodia.------Lieutenant General Vathanak Mongkol
column4: director of the Investigation and Procedure Department
column6: including 1 female had been expelled from the Kingdom in accordance with the Ministry of Interior’s dismissal order dated October 28
column7: 2019 and banned from the country for 3 years in connection with telecommunication fraud scams (VOIP).------The operation also involved the security forces of the Ministry of Public Security of the People’s Republic of China
column8: who will prosecute the 11 on return to China.
